page.title: 07RADIO HARTRIDGE. NEWPORT.
page.content: {Radio Hartridge}is the internal broadcasting system of Hartridge Comprehensive School. The first programme has already been taped with the help of some of our fourth year pupils and is introduced by our own station identity jingle. This has been professionally produced for us. Our programmes will be broadcast on a Thursday morning between 9.10 and 9.20. We hope to include interviews, music,sports fixtures,meetings,a magazine of the air,announcements, and perhaps a quiz. We hope that every pupil in the school will be given the opportunity to take part and also hope that it could form part of a school course. Evenually we think that interested pupils will become part of the team. and will run the station without too much help from teachers.
